text: Tini balalena, â€˜he amara sampradaya tomara amake bala, ami yadi amara raba prerita spasta pramane pratisthita thaki ebam tini yadi amake tamra nijera paksa theke anugraha dana kare thakena, atahpara seta tomadera kache gopana rakha haya, amara ki e bisaye tomaderake badhya karate pari, yakhana tomara eta apachanda kara?â€™
